briefTitle: Widening Aims and Giving Patients a Voice for Expanded Structures in Breast Cancer Care Jointly Developed by Patients and Physicians
officialTitle: Widening Aims and Giving Patients a Voice for Expanded Structures in Breast Cancer Care Jointly Developed by Patients and Physicians (Wechselseitiger Patienten-Arzt-Austausch in Der Versorgung Bei Brustkrebs Mit Dem Ziel Der Gemeinsamen Erarbeitung Neuer Patienten-orientierter Strukturen)
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Current state of care - patient view
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria (patients):

* Breast cancer or DCIS
* women and men aged 18 years and older

Exclusion Criteria (patients):

* women and men \< 18 years
* no histologically confirmed breast cancer or DCIS diagnosis

Inclusion Criteria (physicians):

- Treatment of breast cancer patients
